definition: "cliff" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 27), occurring in 原, 历, 压 etc
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: Revenue and Margin Driver Suppliers take actions that go much further than improving supply chain efficiencies, reactively or proactively.
sentences.chinese: 收入和边际利润驱动厂商对供应链的变革更进一步。

sentences.english: EHC handrails are approved by all major escalator handrail manufacturers.
sentences.chinese: 依合斯扶手带经各扶梯生产厂商批准。

sentences.english: For the Big Three now read the Magnificent Seven.
sentences.chinese: 三大厂商的提法现在变为七强。

sentences.english: This company is specialized in producing fillets of nylon, terylen, PP, cotton, TC, and elastics .
sentences.chinese: 本公司是家专业生产织带产品的厂商。

sentences.english: The modeling language is a proprietary one, reducing intuitiveness.
sentences.chinese: 建模语言也是厂商特有的，缺乏直观性。

sentences.english: The ANCC shall compile maker codes pursuant to the relevant state standards.
sentences.chinese: 编码中心应当按照有关国家标准编制厂商识别代码。

sentences.english: Use the vendor for some hands-on training and mentoring to ramp up quickly.
sentences.chinese: 利用厂商进行一些内行培训和咨询，用以快速掌握。

sentences.english: US major, Pratt & Whitney, was willing only to provide consultancy.
sentences.chinese: 而美国的主要厂商普惠公司只愿意提供咨询服务。

sentences.english: Ideally, you should beware of the potential for vendor lock-in here.
sentences.chinese: 理想情况下，您应该避免厂商锁定。

sentences.english: But no ice-cream company wanted to support the show so it became a milk tea shop.
sentences.chinese: 但是由于没有厂商愿意赞助，冰淇淋店变成了奶茶店。

sentences.english: Large firms do not wish to antagonize the federal government unduly .
sentences.chinese: 大厂商并不想过分地与政府发生顶撞。

sentences.english: Have become the authorization business agent of many well-known and correlated material manufacturers in the meantime.
sentences.chinese: 同时已成为多家知名相关材料厂商的授权代理商。

sentences.english: Definitely more expensive than resistive screens, by between 10% and 50%, depending on who you talk to.
sentences.chinese: 不同厂商的电容屏价格比电阻屏贵10%到50%。

sentences.english: Compiler vendors or developers can extend the set of supported languages.
sentences.chinese: 编译器厂商或开发人员可以扩充支援的语言集合。

sentences.english: We are a leading supplier of plastic injection moulds .
sentences.chinese: 我们是专门供应塑胶钢模的绩优厂商。

sentences.english: DMM:string Specify motherboard manufacturer DMI string.

definition: Dachang Hui autonomous county in Langfang 廊坊[Lang2 fang2], Hebei
operator (of a power station, transport network etc)/carrier (telecommunications etc)
(bus, train etc) depot/car factory or repair shop

three major stars of the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation/the belt of Orion/three spirits 福[fu2], 祿|禄[lu4], and 壽|寿[shou4] associated with the Three Stars 參宿|参宿[Shen1 xiu4] Chinese constellation
Sanxing or Sanhsing township in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan/Samsung (South Korean electronics company)
